Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory14.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "What... what's going on?", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Walking into the lounge, Liv finds the Gray Raven resting area filled with people in uniforms labeled "World Government Association of Art."'}
{1: '1', 3: 'The staff-attired personnel walk in and out of the room, carrying boxes of various sizes. A gorgeous-looking Construct in pink walks up.'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: "—Liv, here you are! I'm so, so sorry for taking up the space in your lounge!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "I-it's okay... But, eh, are we... moving?", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Looking at the piles of cardboard boxes in the room, Liv is understandably confused.'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: "Of course not! C'mon, Liv, check this out! I'm sure you'll find it interesting!", 4: '2'}
{3: 'Ayla puts her arm around Liv as she speaks and gestures toward the door theatrically.'}
{3: 'As if on cue, the door slowly opens to reveal... an enormous, lush, emerald tree planted in an extravagant planter.'}

{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "Indeed, that's just a silver wattle, a common evergreen tree in the genus Acacia of the Fabaceae family. It prefers sunlight instead of shade, so I'd suggest putting it in a garden instead of our lounge...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Lee appears out of nowhere, his arms crossed. It seems like the boxes have taken over his desk and covered him entirely.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ayla', 3: 'Lee, you know your plants!', 4: '1'}
{3: "Ayla grins, completely ignoring Lee's complaint."}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'Then you should also know that a silver wattle is excellent as a—', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "If that's what you're after, you should have used the one in the genus Abies of the Abietoideae subfamily under the Pinales order—", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: "Stop nitpicking! I've spent a lot of effort moving this tree from the botanic garden to here!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "It doesn't seem like you've spent much effort at all.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: "Oh, c'mon, I did spend a lot of money on it!", 4: '1'}
{3: "Ayla's hand gently strokes the tree, rustling its beautiful, lush leaves. It is hard to imagine how much she must have paid to take it out of the Babylonia garden during a post-apocalypse."}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: "That's right! It's a Christmas present for your commandant from me. I want to decorate it and turn it into a proper, festive Christmas tree!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "Oh my... This year's Christmas tree?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: "But I'd require your assistance.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "B-but you're a member of the WGAA. Decorating would be your expertise, not ours...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: "That is true, but I'm no expert in who your commandant is... Unlike you.", 4: '1'}

{2: 'Ayla', 3: "Lee's right. This is just a common silver wattle for now—but when you adorn it with all the gifts everyone's preparing for your commandant, it'll become a gorgeous Christmas Tree filled with love!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "I don't think it'll make any difference giving our presents to the commandant ourselves or hanging them on a tree...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: "Which means you have prepared a present for the commandant, haven't you?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "Actually... I've also prepared Christmas gifts for everyone...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'You have all done so much to show me a good time last Christmas... I also want the Gray Ravens and everybody I know to experience the same joy this year...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Liv stutters as she speaks, her face flushing from her candid confession.'}
{3: 'Ayla squeals, charmed and delighted, as she goes up and hugs Liv affectionately.'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'You sweet thing! Ugh!', 4: '1'}
{3: "Liv raises her arms in Ayla's embrace, dumbfounded by the unexpected compliments."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Ayla... Guys, what are you doing?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Lucia has been standing by the door for who knows how long.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ayla', 3: "We're planning for the Christmas Tree Dress-up Time!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Is that a codename for a new operation?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: "That's right! A new operation to celebrate the Gray Raven Commandant!", 4: '2'}
{3: "Hearing her explanation, Lucia's eyes glow, and her tone becomes extremely serious."}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'In that case, please let me take part in it as well!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'Sure thing!', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Ayla pulls Lucia in with her other hand for a hug.'}
{3: 'Lee lets out a silent sigh before turning away and heading to the door.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "Aren't we getting help from the others as well?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "I'm just going to notify the people who are most definitely getting invited.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "That's wonderful, Lee...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: "That's the spirit! Now, hurry back! Leave this place to us!", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "What's our first step?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "Ayla... y-you're holding me too tight...", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ayla', 3: 'Then I shall declare the Christmas Tree Dress-up Time operation—begins!', 4: '1'}
